alert.note: Alert for Bibb (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 7:07PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Bibb County through 800 PM CDT... At 707 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodstock, or 16 miles east of Holt, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, Ashby, Brierfield Ironworks Park, North Bibb, Green Pond, Hebron, Marvel and Six Mile. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
